Learn With Locals while you travel

Upskill and connect with likeminded people

Learn more

Imagine going to Bali and instead of just chilling by the pool or doing the typical tourist stuff, you might be able to upgrade or pick up a new skill.
Learn with Locals allows you to learn new skills while connecting with likeminded people.

What do you want to learn?

Writing & Content Creation

Learn how to write and create unique content in Bali from a professional journalist.

Bali, Indonesia

1 day - Ali - $100 USD

Photography & Lightroom

Step up your game and learn photography and lightroom while exploring some of the most scenic locations in Bali.

Bali, Indonesia

2 days - Emilio - $250 USD

Web development

Learn how to code and and create your own website, blog or online shop while exploring Bali with locals.

Bali, Indonesia

3 days - Tina - $350 USD

Cindy

Content Strategist
"
I went on a 3 week holiday to Bali and wanted to learn something new and challenge myself, so I signed up for a 3 day coding experience with Tina. Can only recommend this to anyone wanting upskill and learn how to code - in paradise! :)
